mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.discharge_date_expcted AS "dischargeDateExpcted", a.create_date_time AS "createDateTime", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.discharge_disposition_name AS "dischargeDispositionName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: select distinct c.PATIENT_ID AS "patsInHospital.patientId", a.id AS "patsInHospital.id", c.INP_NO AS "patMasterIndex.inpNo", a.BED_NO AS "bedNo", b.BED_LABEL AS "bedRec.bedLabel" , c.NAME AS "patMasterIndex.name" from pats_in_hospital a ,bed_rec b ,pat_master_index c where (a.BED_NO = b.BED_NO and a.WARD_CODE = b.WARD_CODE) and (a.PATIENT_ID = c.PATIENT_ID ) and a.WARD_CODE =#{patsInHospital.wardCode} and a.PATIENT_ID not in (select PATIENT_ID from pre_dischged_pats where patient_id=#{patientId})

SELECT PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.DISCHARGE_DATE_EXPCTED AS "dischargeDateExpcted", PAT_MASTER_INDEX.NAME AS "name", PAT_MASTER_INDEX.SEX AS "sex", PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.DIAGNOSIS AS "diagnosis", PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.ADMISSION_DATE_TIME AS "admissionDateTime" , PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.CREATE_DATE_TIME AS "createDateTime" , PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.PATIENT_ID AS "patientId" , PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.ORDER_NO AS "orderNo" , PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.VISIT_ID AS "visitId" , BED_REC.BED_LABEL AS "bedLabel" , BED_REC.BED_NO AS "bedNo", PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.WARD_CODE AS "wardCode" , DEPT_DICT.DEPT_NAME AS "deptName", PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.DISCHARGE_DISPOSITION_NAME, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.id AS "hospitalId" FROM PAT_MASTER_INDEX , PRE_DISCHGED_PATS , PATS_IN_HOSPITAL , BED_REC, DEPT_DICT WHERE ( PAT_MASTER_INDEX.PATIENT_ID = PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.PATIENT_ID ) and ( PRE_DISCHGED_PATS.PATIENT_ID = PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.PATIENT_ID ) and ( PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.WARD_CODE = BED_REC.WARD_CODE ) and ( PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.BED_NO = BED_REC.BED_NO ) and ( ( PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.WARD_CODE =#{wardCode} ) ) AND (PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_DICT.DEPT_CODE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pre_dischged_pats( id, patient_id, hospital_id, orders_id, org_id, visit_id, discharge_date_expcted, create_date_time, order_no, discharge_disposition_name, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{patientId}, #{hospitalId}, #{ordersId}, #{orgId}, #{visitId}, #{dischargeDateExpcted}, #{createDateTime}, #{orders.orderNo}, #{dischargeDispositionName}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pre_dischged_pats SET patient_id = #{patientId}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId}, orders_id = #{ordersId}, org_id = #{orgId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, discharge_date_expcted = #{dischargeDateExpcted}, order_no=#{orders.orderNo}, create_date_time = #{createDateTime}, discharge_disposition_name = #{dischargeDispositionName}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM orders WHERE id in(select orders_id from pre_dischged_pats where HOSPITAL_ID= #{hospitalId})
